tooltip.m-tweaks.rose_of_the_valley: The smell reminds you of a valley
tooltip.m-tweaks.incubator[0]: A handy little device that is helpful for hatching eggs.
text.autoconfig.m-tweaks.title: m-tweaks config
text.autoconfig.m-tweaks.option.canBeeNe: Pretty self-explanatory. Makes Bee Nests fall after some time,
you can also shoot them with an arrow
text.autoconfig.m-tweaks.option.temperat: TODO: give this perfectly complete feature a proper description
text.autoconfig.m-tweaks.option.leafSlow: Makes entities slower while standing on leaves.
This should discourage players from running above all the fun things
text.autoconfig.m-tweaks.option.quickFir: Makes fire spread a lot faster and wider.
text.autoconfig.m-tweaks.option.incubato: Some options say they require a restart, when they actually don't
I'm not sure what's going on with that
Enables a machine that will hatch eggs for you!
Makes incubator hatch times more random
Enables the m-tweaks certified incubator recipe. Don't forget to run /reload!
text.autoconfig.m-tweaks.option.usefulFl: Gives the Fletching Table a GUI where you can tighten your bow's string, improving accuracy.
text.autoconfig.m-tweaks.option.bedsExpl: Makes beds explode in every dimension.
text.autoconfig.m-tweaks.option.bedExplo: Configurable bed explosion power. Default is 5.0
text.autoconfig.m-tweaks.option.safeBeds: Makes beds not explode when outside the Overworld.
text.autoconfig.m-tweaks.option.campfire: Makes campfires emit potion effects within a certain range.
If off, effects will only apply to players
List of effects you want the campfire to emit
There can be more than one.
Sets a range for campfire to emit effects
text.autoconfig.m-tweaks.option.beeFlowe: When a bee pollinates a flower, the flower has a chance to spread, similar to grass.
This won't happen every pollination, since there's a 3-6 minute cooldown.
text.autoconfig.m-tweaks.option.beeTallF: Enables bee flower duplication for tall flowers, and disables bonemealing tall flowers.
text.autoconfig.m-tweaks.option.villager: Makes villagers follow if you have an emerald block in hand.
text.autoconfig.m-tweaks.option.betterFu: A few tweaks to make furnace minecarts just a bit better:
- Fuel is now saved as an Integer. You can change the fuel limit below.
- You can now use any type of fuel, such as lava buckets, coal blocks, etc.
text.autoconfig.m-tweaks.option.maxFurna: Set the maximum allowed fuel for the furnace minecart. The default is 45000, and the maximum limit is 2147483647.
text.autoconfig.m-tweaks.option.furnaceM: Furnace Minecarts Take Fuel When Low
Makes furnace minecarts take fuel from nearby inventory carts,
such as minecarts with chests, hoppers and possibly modded ones.
If a cart has stopped, you have to push it with your hand before it moves.
text.autoconfig.m-tweaks.option.simpleMi: Allows you to easily connect minecarts to each other with a chain.
This is mostly a recycle of Linkart, but with a bit simpler logic
and a few improvements in the visual department.
text.autoconfig.m-tweaks.option.newMinec: Allows you to enable or disable new minecarts
Enables anvil minecart. It's just slow, nothing else
Enables note block minecart. It works the same way normal note blocks do
text.autoconfig.m-tweaks.option.newBoats: Allows you to enable or disable new boats
I can't believe this – a furnace minecart on water!
Very unstable, explodes on any collision
Never get bored while sailing across the ocean again!
text.autoconfig.m-tweaks.option.slightly: Shows item durability (in %) if durability is less than 100%, or item count if count is more than 1.
text.autoconfig.m-tweaks.option.totemSet: Infinite Totem settings. Please see the wiki for proper descriptions.
Enables ascension of "Totem of Undying" to infinity. Otherwise, there's no way to make IToU.
text.autoconfig.m-tweaks.option.clockToo: Shows in-game time inside clock's tooltip.
text.autoconfig.m-tweaks.option.balanced: Makes mending a bit less overpowered by making it remove the "Too Expensive" error
instead of repairing items via XP.
Also sets anvil's XP cap to 40 levels (but not really!)
Inspired by TheMisterEpic's "This Minecraft Enchantment has been BROKEN for 3 YEARS..." video.
text.autoconfig.m-tweaks.option.tradingG: Every 2 days you can blow the "sing" horn to summon a wandering trader.
Please note, wandering traders will still spawn naturally
You can disable the "doTraderSpawning" gamerule if you don't want them to
text.autoconfig.m-tweaks.option.minecart: Allows players to "pick" blocks via minecarts
Allows players to "pick" spawners via minecarts
Does nothing if Minecart Block Picking is off
text.autoconfig.m-tweaks.option.frameInd: You know that shadow in the advancements menu when you hover over any advancement?
Now it won't speed up/slowdown when your frame rate changes.
text.autoconfig.m-tweaks.option.properly: Now recipe groups won't look janky when there's a lot of recipes in one group.
text.autoconfig.m-tweaks.option.autogenR: Tries to automatically generate recipe advancements for most recipes.
Enables automatic recipe advancement generation. requires a /reload!
Players must find all items in the recipe before it unlocks in the recipe book.
Ignore Recipes Hidden in the Recipe Book
Does not generate advancements for recipe types hidden in the recipe book.
Does not generate advancements for recipes with certain namespaces (part of an ID before ":").
Does not generate advancements for recipes with certain IDs.
text.autoconfig.m-tweaks.option.itemFram: Enables in-game tooltips for item frames.
text.autoconfig.m-tweaks.option.minorInc: Makes the player explode after taking any damage.
text.autoconfig.m-tweaks.option.compatMo: Improves mod compatibility by not loading mixins if their related option is disabled,
but requires a game restart after enabling/disabling any option.
text.autoconfig.m-tweaks.option.debugMes: When turned on, log messages could get spammy.
